data.title: Riddley Walker

data.text:
Edition: First Edition

Book Condition: Collectible - Very Good

Jacket Condition: Very Good

Binding: Hardcover

ISBN: 0671421476

First Edition, Third Printing (Full Number Line). Not price-clipped ($13.95 price intact). Published by Summit Books, 1980. Octavo. Dark blue cloth over green boards stamped in gold. Book is very good; clean with no writing or names. Sharp corners and spine straight. Binding tight and pages crisp. Previous owner name on flyleaf and stamp on bottom page ends. Dust jacket is very good with light shelf wear, large tear on front cover and nicks. 220 pages. ISBN: 0671421476.

100% positive feedback. 30 day money back guarantee. NEXT DAY SHIPPING! Excellent customer service. Please email with any questions or if you would like a photo. All books packed carefully and ship with free delivery confirmation/tracking. All books come with free bookmarks. Ships from Southampton, New York.

Item #144982
